The clan that lives here has developed the ability to evolve their pets into special forms. Evolution is only possible when the pet is summoned. Also, since the process transfers the experience value, evolving a high level pet might actually result in a decrease in the pet's level. Any items in the pet's inventory will be transfered to the owner's inventory. Which pet do you want to evolve? [scripts_services.petevolve.clanhall:greatsw 1|Evolve Great Wolf for a Great Snow Wolf.] [scripts_services.petevolve.clanhall:fenrir 1|Evolve Fenrir into a Snow Fenrir.] [scripts_services.petevolve.clanhall:fenrirW 1|Evolve Great Snow Wolf into a Snow Fenrir.] [scripts_services.petevolve.clanhall:wstrider 1|Evolve Wind Strider into a Red Dragon Bugle of Wind.] [scripts_services.petevolve.clanhall:sstrider 1|Evolve Star Strider into a Red Dragon Bugle of Star.] [scripts_services.petevolve.clanhall:tstrider 1|Evolve Twilight Strider into a Red Dragon Bugle of Twilight.]
